entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Liard River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this morning then changing to rain showers and wet flurries near noon and ending this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 26 April 2023
